meta.title: Digg - What the Internet is talking about right now

div.div: EXPENSIVE EXPERIENCE

div.a: Why I Got Fired From Facebook (A $100 Million Dollar Lesson)

div.div: A former product manager tells the story of how he was fired from Facebook, and what he's learned.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TRTcnM&via=Digg&text=Why I Got Fired From Facebook (A $100 Million Dollar Lesson)

div.div: YES, ALL OF THEM

div.a: The Case For Abolishing Patents In The U.S.

div.div: Critics have suggested plenty of reasonable reforms, from eliminating software patents to clamping down on ”trolls” who buy up patent portfolios only so they can file lawsuits. But do we need a more radical solution? Would we be possibly be better off without any patents at all?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Va4YI6&via=Digg&text=The Case For Abolishing Patents In The U.S.

div.div: MAPOCALYPSE

div.a: Apple No Longer Calls Maps 'The Most Beautiful, Powerful Mapping Service Ever'

div.div: Apple has not only begun recommending competing mapping services but it removed some superlatives from the Maps page.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SLVWBN&via=Digg&text=Apple No Longer Calls Maps 'The Most Beautiful, Powerful Mapping Service Ever'

div.div: GAMERS ONLY 40% HUMAN

div.a: Video Game AI Appears More Human Than Humans

div.div: Two programming teams have created intelligent virtual gamers—or "bots— that have not only beaten the Turing test, but managed to be appear more human than human gamers.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/QBOreH&via=Digg&text=Video Game AI Appears More Human Than Humans

div.div: MENTAL ILLNESS

div.a: How It Feels To Be Diagnosed With A Bipolar Disorder

div.div: The week after my 30th birthday, my best friend had me committed to a psych ward. Two days later, I had emerged with a life-changing diagnosis. The hard part hadn’t even started yet.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/PS6hYU&via=Digg&text=How It Feels To Be Diagnosed With A Bipolar Disorder

div.div: LET THEM EAT, UH, REALLY GOOD FOOD

div.a: What The Kitchen Staff Eat: Recipes From The World's Top Restaurants

div.div: In restaurants around the world, there's one dish you won't find on the menu – the staff meal before service. What do top chefs feed their team?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/USE6xu&via=Digg&text=What The Kitchen Staff Eat: Recipes From The World's Top Restaurants

div.div: 2012 ELECTION

div.a: Why We Can't Stop Watching The Stupid Presidential Debates

div.div: Presidential debates rarely reshape elections or tell us anything new about candidates, so why do tens of millions of Americans tune in every cycle?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TOtGzI&via=Digg&text=Why We Can't Stop Watching The Stupid Presidential Debates

div.div: BLAST BAHA MEN ON REPEAT!

div.a: The Douchiest Cars Of All Time

div.div: Pardon our French, but the D-word is only the latest overused, off-color term to describe the phenomena of universal hate-ability that accompanies some people, and, as it happens, some cars.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/QvSNUx&via=Digg&text=The Douchiest Cars Of All Time

div.div: FOOTBALL

div.a: I Was A Replacement Ref: Inside The NFL's 7 Weirdest Weeks

div.div: Jerry Frump, a banker who lives in the Chicago area, has refereed college football for 30 years. But this summer, when the NFL announced it was looking into casting replacements, he jumped at the chance – putting his college-football career in jeopardy in the process.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UTG0Oz&via=Digg&text=I Was A Replacement Ref: Inside The NFL's 7 Weirdest Weeks

div.div: TO BE FAIR, THOSE PELLETS DO STING

div.a: Czech President Shot With Toy Gun, Bodyguards Do Nothing

div.div: A young man wielding a plastic gun fired pellets at Czech President Vaclav Klaus on Friday, hitting him on the arm but causing no injuries.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SK0jNB&via=Digg&text=Czech President Shot With Toy Gun, Bodyguards Do Nothing

div.div: SO THAT'S WHY MY TRAIN IS ALWAYS LATE

div.a: Amtrak Workers Doing Cocaine On The Job

div.div: Drug and alcohol use by Amtrak operating employees in safety-sensitive positions far exceeds the national average for the railroad industry.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UyPGcL&via=Digg&text=Amtrak Workers Doing Cocaine On The Job

div.div: SHOOTING POOL

div.a: Amazing Photos Show What It Looks Like to Fire a Gun Underwater

div.div: Firearm enthusiasts do the darndest things.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SVgbaL&via=Digg&text=Amazing Photos Show What It Looks Like to Fire a Gun Underwater

div.div: LITTLE BO PEEPSHOW

div.a: China's Six Biggest Political Sex Scandals

div.div: Once Chinese party officials fall, the curtain surrounding their private lives falls with them. Here are six officials, high and low, who have been exposed.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Qx7eIk&via=Digg&text=China's Six Biggest Political Sex Scandals

div.div: EMERGENCY ENGAGEMENTS

div.a: This Might Be The Worst Marriage Proposal Ever

div.div: This guy pretended the two person plane they were on was crashing, but surprise! It wasn't really, just a simple marriage proposal.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/QLvrHR&via=Digg&text=This Might Be The Worst Marriage Proposal Ever

div.div: MAPOCALYPSE

div.a: Original iPhone Maps App Built By 2 Engineers In 3 Weeks

div.div: "I've read more than I ever wanted to about maps this week, but this story about how the original, Google-powered Maps.app was built for the original iPhone caught my attention."

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/PfzSJx&via=Digg&text=Original iPhone Maps App Built By 2 Engineers In 3 Weeks

div.div: TO TWEET OR NOT TO TWEET
Fox News accidentally showed a man killing himself on live TV. Was it right for other sites to post and link to it?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SKbVA5&via=Digg&text=A Suicide Gone Viral

div.div: THERE'S NOWHERE TO RUN

div.a: Even The Health Department Isn't Safe From Bedbugs

div.div: A single bedbug led to the temporary evacuation and fumigation of one floor of the city’s Department of Health and Mental Hygiene’s headquarters in Queens.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UULSqG&via=Digg&text=Even The Health Department Isn't Safe From Bedbugs

div.div: OFFICE SPACE

div.a: This Is What Einstein's Office Looked Like On The Day He Died

div.div: Evidently, a cluttered desk does not lead to a cluttered mind.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SrzlVc&via=Digg&text=This Is What Einstein's Office Looked Like On The Day He Died

div.div: AND NOW HE NEEDS A TON OF PENICILLIN

div.a: The Man Who Got To The Bottom Of The Porn Industry's Syphilis Outbreak

div.div: If, as Ron Jeremy has said, the porn industry is like a family, Mike South is the know-it-all uncle you'd avoid at reunions if he wasn't right so much of the time.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/PdLWel&via=Digg&text=The Man Who Got To The Bottom Of The Porn Industry's Syphilis Outbreak

div.div: SERENITY NOW!

div.a: Kramer Reunites With Jerry Seinfeld, Talks Meltdown

div.div: Michael Richards tells Jerry Seinfeld what he learned from his infamous standup outburst.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SI9D4L&via=Digg&text=Kramer Reunites With Jerry Seinfeld, Talks Meltdown

div.div: HE'S PROBABLY THE ONLY ONE

div.a: Why Justin Bieber Can't Compete With Steve Jobs

div.div: Google has released a new version of Trends that lets anyone with an internet connection peer into the global hive mind. We took it for a test drive.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/QL45lg&via=Digg&text=Why Justin Bieber Can't Compete With Steve Jobs
